Hosting your own Firefly instance¶

Hosting Firefly locally¶

Using run_server.py¶

Using the Firefly executable¶

Using python -m http.server¶

Note

The Load New Data only works in this mode.

Hosting a static version on the internet¶

github pages is a great way to host it, it will use index.html
